text.emotional: [anger, low]Listen, that might sound arrogant, but I’m quite good at my job.[/anger] [happiness, low]Still, the amount of times a chicken escaped from one of my coops…[/happiness]
text.silence: {.} listen that might sound {.} arrogant but i'm quite good at my job {...} still {...} the amount of times a chicken escaped from one of my coops {...}
